titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: CRITICAL CARE START YEAR AND MONTH - Description

div.p: CRITICAL CARE START YEAR AND MONTH is the year and month in which a CRITICAL CARE PERIOD started.
For the National Neonatal Data Set - Episodic and Daily Care, CRITICAL CARE START YEAR AND MONTH is submitted instead of CRITICAL CARE START DATE AND TIME, where the data set record is anonymised.
